channel.title: electromagnetic on NGENUITY™ 3D Visualization System User Guide
channel.description: Recent content in electromagnetic on NGENUITY™ 3D Visualization System User Guide

item.title: Guidance and Manufacturer Declaration - Electromagnetic Emissions
item.description: The NGENUITY™ system is intended for use in the electromagnetic environments specified below. The customer or the user of the*NGENUITY™ system should assure it is used in such an environment. Emissions Test Compliance Electromagnetic Environment - Guidance RF Emissions (CISPR 11) Group 1 The system uses RF energy only for its internal functions. Therefore, its RF emissions are low and are not likely to cause any interference in nearby electronic equipment.

item.title: Guidance and Manufacturer Declaration - Electromagnetic Immunity
item.description: The NGENUITY™ system is intended for use in the electromagnetic environments specified below. The customer or the user of the NGENUITY™ system should assure it is used in such an environment. Immunity Test IEC 60601 Test and Compliance Level Electromagnetic Environment - Guidance Electrostatic Discharge (IEC 61000-4-2) +/-8 kV contact, +/-15 kV air Floors should be wood, concrete, or ceramic tile. If floors are covered with synthetic material, the relative humidity should be at least 30%.
